contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 10, 1955 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest 1st CWS Manchester (91), 2nd YEWCO, 3rd Clayton Aniline. Hymn tune 1st CWS Manchester(99), 2nd Clayton Aniline(98), 3rd Bowhill Colliery(89). Deportment 1st Bowhill Colliery, 2nd Bonnybridge. 7th annual contest 10 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:11 p.m. June 6, 2014, 9:43 a.m.
1 City of Manchester Alex Mortimer Freedom (Brass Band Symphony No. 1)
2 Cooperation Band Elgar Clayton An Epic Symphony
3 Clayton Aniline Edward Buttress Sinfonietta for Brass Band [Leidzen]
4 Bellshill & District Concert Brass Dugald MacBrayne The Three Musketeers
Unknown Result Westoe Band Albert Badrick Rhapsody in Brass
Unknown Result YEWCO Albert Lunn The Severn Suite
Unknown Result Bickershaw Colliery W. Clegg Labour and Love
Unknown Result Forfar Instrumental Elgar Clayton Lorenzo
Unknown Result Bowhill Colliery and District Silver Band Drake Rimmer Scheherazade
Unknown Result Bonnybridge & District George Hespe Tchaikovsky [arr. W. Rimmer]
